com.epoch.session

Class InstructorSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.session.UserSession
      • com.epoch.session.StudentSession
        • com.epoch.session.InstructorSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppConstants, UserConstants, AnySessionConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminSession

    public class InstructorSession
extends StudentSession
implements UserConstants
    An instructor's work session.

    • Field Detail

      • enrollmentPreloadedId

        private transient int enrollmentPreloadedId
        Course ID for which enrollment data is already loaded. May be different from the selected course for a short time.

        private transient List<EnrollmentData> enrolledUsers
        Students enrolled in the course.

      • getAssgtAndQNums

        public int[][] getAssgtAndQNums(int[] linkedAssgtQIds)
                         throws DBException,
                                InvalidOpException
        Gets the assignment and an array of question numbers corresponding to the assignment and question ID numbers for this instructor. The array of question numbers has one member for fixed questions and two members for questions that are part of a randomized group.
        Parameters:
        linkedAssgtQIds - the assignment and question ID numbers
        Returns:
        array of two arrays: a 1-membered array with the assignment number, and a 0- to 2-membered array with the question number or numbers
        Throws:
        InvalidOpException - when no course has been selected
        DBException - if the database can't be read

      • blockUsers

        public void blockUsers(int[] modifyNums,
                       boolean block)
                throws InvalidOpException,
                       DBException,
                       ParameterException
        Blocks or unblocks users from the current course's forum.
        Parameters:
        modifyNums - 1-based indices in enrolledUsers of the students to block or unblock
        block - whether to block or unblock them
        Throws:
        ParameterException - when a student index is out of bounds or a student is not registered
        InvalidOpException - when no course has been selected or the list of already-enrolled or enrolled-but-not-registered students has not been initialized
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • mergeAssgts

        public void mergeAssgts(int[] hwNums)
                 throws DBException
        Merges two or more assignments into a single assignment.
        Parameters:
        hwNums - 1-based numbers of assignments to merge in order of their position in the list of assignments; first assignment in list will be retained, others discarded after their content is added to the first assignment
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • setAssgtDependency

        public void setAssgtDependency(int dependentHWNum,
                               int masteryHWNum)
                        throws DBException,
                               ParameterException
        Makes the visibility of an assignment dependent on another assignment being mastered.
        Parameters:
        dependentHWNum - 1-based position of the dependent assignment
        masteryHWNum - 1-based position of the mastery assignment that must be mastered before the dependent assignment can be displayed to a student
        Throws:
        ParameterException - when positions are not in range
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • getAllRegdStudents

        public final EnrollmentData[] getAllRegdStudents(int numYears,
                                                 int selectedInstitnId)
                                          throws DBException
        Gets all students registered in ACE who attend either the institution of an instructor or coinstructor of the currently selected course or a given institution, and who registered within a certain number of years.
        Parameters:
        numYears - number of years back from now in which students
        selectedInstitnId - ID of the institution whose registered students to list; if 0, the institution of the instructor or coinstructor of the currently selected course
        Returns:
        array of EnrollmentData of the registered students
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database can't be read

                                    throws InvalidOpException,
                                           DBException
        Gets all student ID numbers of students from an institution who are enrolled in the currently selected course.
        Parameters:
        instnId - ID number of school from which to get the enrolled students; ANY_INSTITUTION if should ignore school
        Returns:
        list of student ID numbers of the enrolled students
        Throws:
        InvalidOpException - when no course has been selected
        DBException - if the database can't be read

      • enroll

        public void enroll(EnrollmentData[] entries)
            throws InvalidOpException,
                   DBException
        Enroll students in the currently selected course. Used for batch enrollment.
        Parameters:
        entries - EnrollmentData of the students to enroll
        Throws:
        InvalidOpException - when no course has been selected or the list of already-enrolled or enrolled-but-not-registered students has not been initialized
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • enrollRegistered

        public void enrollRegistered(EnrollmentData[] regdStudents,
                             List<Integer> toEnroll)
                      throws ParameterException,
                             DBException
        Enroll students at this instructor's institution who are registered in ACE in the currently selected course.
        Parameters:
        regdStudents - registered students from which enrollees were chosen
        toEnroll - 1-based indices of students in regdStudents
        Throws:
        ParameterException - when a student index is out of bounds
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • disenroll

        public void disenroll(String[] disenrolleeNumStrs)
               throws InvalidOpException,
                      DBException,
                      ParameterException
        Disenroll students from the currently selected course.
        Parameters:
        disenrolleeNumStrs - 1-based indices in enrolledUsers of the students to disenroll
        Throws:
        ParameterException - when student indices are not in ascending order or one is out of bounds
        InvalidOpException - when no course has been selected or the list of already-enrolled or enrolled-but-not-registered students has not been initialized
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • modifyTAs

        public void modifyTAs(int[] modifyNums,
                      boolean promote)
               throws InvalidOpException,
                      DBException,
                      ParameterException
        Modifies the TA status of students in the currently selected course.
        Parameters:
        modifyNums - 1-based indices in enrolledUsers of the students to promote or demote
        promote - whether to promote or demote them
        Throws:
        ParameterException - when a student index is out of bounds or a student is not registered
        InvalidOpException - when no course has been selected or the list of already-enrolled or enrolled-but-not-registered students has not been initialized
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • transferWork

        public void transferWork(List<String[]> students,
                         int OLD_LOGIN,
                         int NEW_LOGIN)
                  throws DBException
        Transfers work that was done in a course under one login ID to a different login ID, and deletes the first login ID.
        Parameters:
        students - names, student ID numbers, old login IDs, and new login IDs of students whose work is to be transferred
        OLD_LOGIN - the member of students containing the old login ID
        NEW_LOGIN - the member of students containing the new login ID
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

                            boolean lock)

      • createMarvinLivePort

        public int createMarvinLivePort(String rootURL,
                                String idleTime)
                         throws DBException
        Assigns a port number and activates a Marvin Live session for the active course.
        Parameters:
        rootURL - the root of all app URLs, e.g., http://epoch.uky.edu. Never https (always http), no port numbers.
        idleTime - amount of time session is idle before it is turned off
        Returns:
        the port number of the Marvin Live session of the current active course
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • endMarvinLiveSession

        public void endMarvinLiveSession()
                          throws DBException
        Terminates the Marvin Live session for the active course and deletes its directory.
        Throws:
        DBException - if the database can't be written to

      • getJson

        private String getJson(String rootURL,
                       int portNumber,
                       String idleTime)
        Creates the JSON configuration file for Marvin Live.
        Parameters:
        rootURL - the root of all app URLs, e.g., http://epoch.uky.edu. Never https (always http), no port numbers.
        portNumber - the port number for the Marvin Live session
        idleTime - amount of time session is idle before it is turned off
        Returns:
        the contents of the JSON configuration file

      • writeJsonToFile

        private String writeJsonToFile(String json,
                               int portNumber)
                        throws IOException
        Writes the given string to a file.
        Parameters:
        json - the string to write
        portNumber - the port number for the Marvin Live session
        Returns:
        absolute name of the output file
        Throws:
        IOException - if can't write file
